row1.name: GrapesJs/VueJs Website Builder
row1.shortDescription: Custom Visual Website using a drag and drop interface
row1.longDescription: Website building framework build on GrapesJs using VueJs and Vuex. Backend built using Python/Flask

row1.name: 360Giving Data Visualization
row1.longDescription: Visualisation of a large set of data from 360Giving. They needed different ways to visualize the main charities and who funds them, as well as breakdowns on the types of charities and grants

row1.name: theahoeg.com
row1.shortDescription: Portfolio website for Architect and Designer Thea HÃ¸eg
row1.longDescription: Website with a minimalist theme built using Wordpress

row2.name: Cafe Shop -  NFC Membership
row2.shortDescription: Wireless card membership system for a cafe
row2.longDescription: A full card based membership solution for a cafe. The requirement was that members could scan a card or a sticker on the scanner, and on the press of a button they could either be registered as new members or checked if still valid members. The solution runs on a raspberry pi, and deployed using Docker containers. The server is built in Python using Flask, and the scanning is done using a Node based NFC Library

row2.name: gettheevent.com
row2.shortDescription: Crowdsourcing platform for finding event professionals
row2.longDescription: An online crowdsourcing application for creating events and having professionals from the event industry create profiles and bid on the event. Profile pages, rating system, and event creation. I created the frontend application using AngularJS, and was the first time I experimented with Docker

row2.name: Playground: Upgrading State Managed Angular
row2.shortDescription: Experimenting with upgrading an AngularJs application to Angular
row2.longDescription: In this project I upgraded an AngularJs application that uses a Redux store as a state management system. The applications are then bootstrapped together, and can run in hybrid mode, and the redux store is shared
